name: Kitchen Katastrophe
description:
Franticly collect recipe ingredients to serve your waiting customer. 

You'll have to throw your ingredients away if you collect the wrong one, causing you to lose money.

Server your customer you delicious dishes and earn big bucks!

How much money can you earn?

This a gameplay video that I made in a week for an assignment in COMP 369: Practical Game Programming from Athabasca University. I made it with C++ and Allegro 4.4.2.

This is a pre-alpha release. I would love to hear your feedback on:

  • what you loved about the game
  • what you didn't like about the game
  • ideas for improvement
  • bugs or glitches you encountered
